remarks.para: One N2 indication may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: N1 and N3 EICAS indications for associated engine are operative,
N1 STANDBY indications for associated engine are operative, and
Fuel flow indications for associated engine are operative.

placard.para: Placard near upper EICAS "L (R) N2 TACH INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
